thread.title: Warriors confirm Roger Tuivasa-Sheck to captain side, Tohu Harris signed for 2018
thread.title_full: Warriors confirm Roger Tuivasa-Sheck to captain side, Tohu Harris signed for 2018

title: Warriors confirm Roger Tuivasa-Sheck to captain side, Tohu Harris signed for 2018
text:
Warriors confirm Roger Tuivasa-Sheck to captain side, Tohu Harris signed for 2018 Last updated 17:48, February 1 2017 PHOTOSPORT 
Roger Tuivasa-Sheck will captain the Warriors this season. 
Roger Tuivasa-Sheck will captain the New Zealand Warriors in 2017. 
New coach Stephen Kearney confirmed the 23-year-old fullback would lead the side this season, after missing most of 2016 with a serious knee injury. 
The club also announced they had signed Tohu Harris on a four-year deal from 2018.
